PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-06042017-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectBuffalo and Fort Erie Public Bridge Company
PrecisOrder fixing the increase of aggregate principal amount of negotiable bonds that the BUFFALO AND FORT ERIE PUBLIC BRIDGE AUTHORITY can issue, sell or exchange at any one time in order to implement a capital plan that includes a comprehensive re-decking and rehabilitation of the international bridge.
AttachmentsAttachment
